summary: Changes the Skyrim lighting to a more colorful, fantasy style.
descriptionHtml:
[size=10][color=lightblue]Surreal Lighting[/color][/size]
Surreal Lighting changes the Skyrim lighting to a more colorful, fantasy style.
Gone are the depressing times that makes you want to quit right away.

Also available at Steam Workshop:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=224440211]Surreal Lighting[/url]

You can look at screenshots in Photos page or see this short video:

[youtube]bbUCp9pvGjs[/youtube]

[color=lightblue]Requirements:[/color]
No requirements, SKSE not required.

[color=lightblue]Installation:[/color]
- Copy the .esp in your Data folder and enable it.
[color=lightblue]Uninstallation:[/color]
- Delete the .esp from your Data folder.

[color=lightblue]Incompatibility:[/color]
This mod is NOT compatible with other lighting mods such as:
- Realistic Lighting Overhaul (Interiors only is OK)
- Climates of Tamriel
- No Tints and Desaturation
- Other lighting mods ...
author: Arindel
